sourcesContent:
import './post.css' import { MoreVert } from '@material-ui/icons' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.likes.length) const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false) const [user, setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`users/${post.userId}`) setUser(res.data) } fetchUser() }, []) const likeHandler = () => { setLike(isLiked ? like - 1 : like + 1) setIsLiked(!isLiked) } return (
{user.username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
